name: Enloc Project
description:
Summary of Game:

Our main character’s taken by a dangerous E-Corp and they’re testing their brand new Enloc Project, in this Project they connect people to a machine that can reach their subconsciousness. This Machine allows subjects to see things that they fear the most.

 

How to Play:

Enloc Project uses the W, A, S, D keys to move character.

Shooting system requires the Mouse device. Aiming system requires players to spin the Mouse device and fire whenever needed by left click of the Mouse.
